snippet: Four Tunisian soldiers were killed Wednesday and 11 others were wounded in an attack on a bus carrying soldiers in Kef near the Algerian border, according to the Defense Ministry, which blamed terrorists.
lead_paragraph: Four Tunisian soldiers were killed Wednesday and 11 others were wounded in an attack on a bus carrying soldiers in Kef near the Algerian border, according to the Defense Ministry, which blamed terrorists.

headline.main: Tunisia: Soldiers Die in Attack on Bus
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Soldiers Die in Attack on Bus
